episodes.title: 10 EASY ways to take care of yourself after escaping a cult
episodes.description: Self care can be hard when you have no energy & no self love, which is both common after getting out of restrictive religion. This is why I wanted to create this list of 10 quick ways you can heal from religious trauma and invest in yourself. All of these take less than 5 minutes and are ADHD friendly. Small actions in the right direction will add up :) xx

episodes.title: Why I miss being in a cult
episodes.description:
Covering the untold side of cults, the one that people usually completely leave out: *What was good about growing up in a cult!* It‘s important to talk about it though, since in order to be happy with your life outside, it is important to see which ones of your needs were met really well when in restrictive religion, and how you can recreate this in a healthy way, so you won‘t just get into the next cult looking for it.

I grew up in a fundamentalist Baptist sect in Germany, a branch of the Brüder-Baptistengemeinde that is very secluded and off the radar. More about it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSBjOyR24S0&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA5PFeGyflrN7ak7bxmBptKM&index=4

Here‘s how I got out: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8q--0FrK5j4&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA5PFeGyflrN7ak7bxmBptKM&index=3

If you like this video, you might also like this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WRQeXdpGi0E&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA5PFeGyflrN7ak7bxmBptKM&index=2

Follow along if this resonates with you! :)

episodes.title: Queer in a Homophobic Cult
episodes.description:
Queer people in those kind of environments, please watch until the end.

This is one of the hardest videos I’ve ever shared, but I felt like someone needed to see this. If you’re LGBTQ+ and have felt alone in an environment that tells you you are wrong, this video is for you.

In this video, I will share how I found out i am bisexual, without even knowing what that was. I grew up in an isolated religious sect where being queer was the worst possible thing one could be.

- So how did I know? How was it figuring that out?
- How did I come out of the closet to my family and friends?
- How was the first relationship with a woman?
- How is my life now?

I tell you all the tea here.

My next video will be a Q&A so just comment any questions under this video and I will answer them. If anyone even reads the description until here, please comment this emoji: 💅

Follow along if this resonates with you and you want to support this channel! I really want to build a community of cool people here :) 

Other video you might be interested in: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WRQeXdpGi0E&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA5PFeGyflrN7ak7bxmBptKM

🎵 Music Credits:
Life on Hold - Everet Almond
Depth Fuse - French Fuse

episodes.title: Breaking all my cult’s rules in one day (full makeover)
episodes.description:
This video was a pretty spontaneous idea. It ended with a huge reality check, but I felt like it was important to show that part too. Since it shows why it can be soo hard to go against the rules, even if you are out of the cult for many years. Please don’t roast my ugly crying, I am way too sensitive for that 😂

If you want to know more about how I grew up, check out this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8q--0FrK5j4&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA5PFeGyflrN7ak7bxmBptKM

episodes.title: how I escaped a cult
episodes.description:
I grew up in an abusive, misogynistic and homophobic cult as a sensitive, bisexual woman. Now, 8 years after escaping, I am finally sharing my story.

My last video where I exposed the church I was in (a sect nobody talks about since there is no information on it anywhere) went kind of viral, a big THANK YOU to all of you for making that happen! ❤️ If you have not seen it yet, it will give you some context for my story: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSBjOyR24S0&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA5PFeGyflrN7ak7bxmBptKM

A lot of you have been asking for my personal story of getting out. So in this video, I will tell you how I escaped the cult, despite having been indoctrinated since I was a child and without any outside help or influence. I will tell you about how my family, friends and other sect members reacted when I left, and in the end as a little bonus the thing that shocked me the most about “the world” after leaving?

0:00     Intro
0:39      Part 1: What growing up in the cult was like
3:16      Part 2: The point I realized the cult sucked
5:19      Part 3: My breaking point & decision to leave
7:29      Part 4: Confrontation with parents & other members
9:46      Part 5: The aftermath (finding my place, outing myself, …)
12:38  Outro & what shocked me most about “the world”

—

A bit about me: I'm Angeline (she/her) from Germany. Exposing myself like this on YT makes me feel very vulnerable, but it’s also kind of empowering. As a sensitive person that values mental health a lot, I want to create a safe space here where people find solace and compassion - because we all need more of that.

Follow along if this resonates with you! :)

—

Copyright:
Background music in this storytime video is Maestro Tlakaelel by Jesse Gallagher.

episodes.title: nobody knows this cult exists
episodes.description:
I wanted to do this video for years. Right now I have the courage, I might delete this later.

Growing up in an abusive, misogynistic and homophobic cult as a sensitive, bisexual woman, there were a lot of things I always felt were wrong. But they were so normalised in the church culture that I thought I was the problem. Now, 8 years after leaving, I am finally breaking the silence about the disturbing practices happening behind the church's walls.

00:00 Intro
00:52 Background information on the cult
01:25 Evangelisation services that spread fear
02:28 Rules that keep you in the church
03:32 Rules that keep you isolated from “the world”
06:51 Rules on appearance, s*xualisation from a young age
08:53 Rules on s*x & dating (purity culture)
09:44 Marriage rules & non-consensual s*x
12:03 Abstinence-only policy, LGBTQ+ issues
12:51 No contraception / forced births
14:16 Child abuse - physical “discipline”
15:16 Sexism & traditional roles for men vs. women
17:18 Justification for the rules
17:55 No privacy, every detail shared with everyone
19:55 Funny rules that show how s*x-obsessed the rule-makers are
21:43 Outro

—

The background picture from the Thumbnail is a random church in the Network, not the one I grew up in. I got the picture from here:  https://www.come-on.de/volmetal/kierspe/baptisten-auf-gebaeudesuche-91362709.html

—

In this video, I share my personal experiences growing up in the mostly unknown religious community that can be classified as a cult or sect: The Brüder-Baptistengemeinde in Germany, a German-Russian Baptist church. I’ve wanted to make this video for years but was too scared, since so much of my personal history is connected to this cult and I still have many people I love in there.

Nonetheless, I feel it's important to expose the disturbing truths that happen behind closed doors. From child abuse and marital r*pe to the severe oppression of women and many bizarre and oppressive rules related to purity culture, I lay bare some dark realities of life in this cult.

I do not want to offend anyone’s religious beliefs or speak against Christians or Baptists per se. That is not my intention at all. While I focus on the negative aspects in this video, I admit that the religion also brought many good experiences.

But there were also a lot of negative experiences, connected to the rules that I describe in this video. And just because people willingly follow these rules, it does not make the rules okay: People would follow anything if they were strongly convinced not following it would lead to eternal damnation!!!

Okay, I’ll end my rant here. Please share and comment if you have any similar experiences or if this video resonates with you in any way. (Also, probably no one reads this until the end, but if you have, let me know by commenting this emoji: 🙈)

—

If you like this video, you might also like my acoustic cover of Bird Set Free (it’s basically my life story in a song): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TgQUMs7VaMY&list=PLy4gl3Z6BBA6fbnQSWusB9xKBUgm0R6Je&index=9
